return-one-title: Refund requests will be processed under mentioned situation
terms-one-content:
1. Customer must provide the prescriptions which proves that his medicines have been changed by the doctor.

2. Customer must has to provide the invoice.

3. Customer must purchase our medicine from oMedEasy

4. Customer must purchase our medicine from oMedEasy

5. The returned medicine price would be added in customer MedEasy wallet.
